imdb.title: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa
imdb.plot: The anime follows a salary man who has a chance meeting with a girl named Ai on the train. They begin to meet every Monday on the train, with the man serving as her bodyguard on the crowded commute while they chat.

episodes.title: Part 1
episodes.plot: In the new school semester, Ai gives two buttons instead of one to Salaryman while on the train and he wonders why.

episodes.title: Part 2
episodes.plot: A third year high school girl is teasing a teacher she likes since her love confession in her first year but yet no replies from him. However, she's not giving up on him until the day she graduates.

episodes.title: Part 3
episodes.plot: One morning, Kouhai and Senpai are going on a company trip to Kyushu.

episodes.title: Part 4
episodes.plot: The graduated high school girl shows her swimsuit to Teacher while asking him to take her to the beach.

episodes.title: Part 5
episodes.plot: Salaryman is going to a trip together with Ai as promised on holiday break. During the trip, Ai notices Salaryman has not been sleeping well and he explains that his neighbors next door are the cause of his insomnia.

episodes.title: Part 6
episodes.plot: One day while on train, Ai asks Salaryman whether the problems regarding his neighbors are solved. One morning, Maegami wakes up Teacher and finds out that he has a fever. One night at Senpai's apartment, Kouhai addresses her jealousy to Senpai when she saw someone buying a wedding ring.

episodes.title: Part 7
episodes.plot: One morning, Ai's mother finds a bra hanging from the balcony and asks Ai and her sister about this.

episodes.title: Part 8
episodes.plot: During lunch at ramen shop, Senpai and Kouhai see a live TV program showing high school cheerleaders and Senpai warns Kouhai not to be captured on camera from weird angles. Kouhai also reminds him to delete the photo she sent him wearing a school uniform. Meanwhile, a red haired cheerleader who is popular at high school teases her childhood friend.

episodes.title: Part 9
episodes.plot: On a company trip to a hot spring, Kouhai challenges Senpai to a game of Ping Pong but he loses after being distracted by her constantly moving breasts. Late that night, Senpai decides to take a dip in the hot spring and finds that Kouhai has the same idea.

episodes.title: Part 10
episodes.plot: One day on the train, Ai shows Salaryman a short news video of her appearing on the cheerleading team and she asks how he would react if she was scouted by model agency.

episodes.title: Part 11
episodes.plot: One day at school, Ai has trouble wiping the blackboard, so her friend lifts her up but the sudden movement breaks Ai's bra. She decides to buy a new one and her friend accompanies her.

episodes.title: Part 12
episodes.plot: On Maegami and Teacher's wedding day, Ai's sister has to help Ai zip up her blouse because of her increasing bust size. The wedding ceremony goes smoothly and Ai catches the bridal flower bouquet. Meanwhile, Cheer-chan is envious when she sees the bridal party during a photo shoot. Kouhai feels envious too while passing by but Senpai tries to discourage her from thoughts of marriage.

episodes.title: Part 13
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Tawawa on Monday
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, a high school girl named Ai meets with a salaryman at a train station.

episodes.title: A Reliable Yet Clumsy Junior
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, a Kouhai office woman is helping her Senpai working on his deadline.

episodes.title: Tawawa Sports
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, the Salaryman is getting scolded by his Chief Manager for not able to satisfy his quota. After seeing a pamphlet of a gym named Tawawa Sports, he opted to visit.

episodes.title: Angel of Blue Monday
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, Ai and Salaryman are talking about Ai's part time job and her popularity.

episodes.title: Ai and the Pivotal Check-Up
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, Ai tells Salaryman how tall she is and that she's on a diet due to a regular medical check up at her school.

episodes.title: The Not-so-invulnerable Junior
episodes.plot: A female employee asks if Kouhai wants to go on a blind date. When she refuses, the female employee mentions Kouhai's ex-boyfriend in front of the Senpai.

episodes.title: Ai and Her Summer Memory
episodes.plot: One Monday morning in Summer, Ai tells Salaryman that she's going to spend her summer vacation with her cool and popular best friend while Salaryman complains that unlike students, workers barely get a day off.

episodes.title: Absolute Effective Painkiller
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, Ai notices that Salaryman has a toothache and advises him to go to the dentist.

episodes.title: Ai and the Bakery Uniform
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, Salaryman visits Ai at her part-time job as a waitress at a bakery.

episodes.title: Ai and the Marathon Battle
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, Ai is having trouble while running the school's marathon.

episodes.title: Reminiscing with Regret How I Completely Missed Seeing Her in Her Late Teens
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, an office worker attends his junior high school reunion and meets a woman whom he missed his chance with back in their student days.

episodes.title: Ai and the Stairs to Adulthood
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, Salaryman asks what Ai did during Christmas, which she initially refuses to answer. Later, she reveals that she ''has taken a step into adulthood'', going from ''I-chan'' to ''J-chan.''

episodes.title: The Careless but Loveable and Cute Junior
episodes.plot: One Monday morning, Kouhai is preparing for her work and forgets to zip up her skirt.

episodes.title: Ai and Private Filming
episodes.plot: While cleaning Salaryman's room, Ai finds an adult video in which the actress wears the same uniform as her part time job.
